Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to increasing the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit
Summary: Relates to increasing the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit; increases the amount of the credit from $200 to $500 for single filers who have served for less than five years and from $200 to $1,000 for single filers who serve at least five years and from $400 to $1,000 for spouses filing jointly where one spouse has served less than five years and from $400 to $2,000 for spouses filing jointly who have each served at least five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit
